titleStmt.title: Two sermons, lately preached at Langar in the valley of Belvoir. By C.O.
titleStmt.author: Odingsells, Charles, d. 1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby, and are to be sold by Iohn Parker at the signe of the three Pidgeons in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: "A discourse of miracles" has separate title page, dated 1619. Pagination and register are continuous.
Another issue, with cancel title page, of the 1619 edition.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the three Pidgeons in Pauls Churchyard
